channel.title: CVE Feed for SlickRemix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SlickRemix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-36739|2024-08-04T17:37:07.230Z -- slickremix -- feed%20them%20social%20%E2%80%93%20page%2C%20post%2C%20video%2C%20and%20photo%20galleries
item.description: The Feed Them Social â€“ Page, Post, Video, and Photo Galleries plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 2.8.6. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the my_fts_fb_load_more() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to load feeds via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-24710|2024-06-06T14:14:29.961Z -- slickremix -- feed%20them%20social
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in SlickRemix Feed Them Social.This issue affects Feed Them Social: from n/a through 4.2.0.
